value:
$WmMPID_炎部族リンカ,ch05_51_Rinka_F_FireFes22,Face|The hour has come... Listen here!
This is a sacred competition that
has been passed down in my tribe.$k$pGive anything less than your all,
and the gods may very well reach
down and smite you themselves.$k$p$WmMPID_双界ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_FF_Pair,Face|I had no idea the stakes were
so high. I'll have to start taking
this more seriously...$k$p$nMPID_神階ピアニー|What? I thought we were here to
have fun and play carnival games!
Is this not that kind of festival?$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族リンカ,ch05_51_Rinka_F_FireFes22,Face|Carnival games? Whatever those
are, I assure you our purpose here
is beyond simply having fun!$k$pI knew we'd have some newcomers,
but this competition is no place for
a sheltered princess...$k$p$WmMPID_双界ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_FF_Pair,Face|Well, I— ...No, you're right. I may
have been a touch shielded from
the world.$k$pEven compared to Eirika, who is
herself a younger sister, I get the
feeling my life has been easier...$k$pBut we're here now, and there's no
going back! ...Do we have any chance
of winning though?$k$p$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Ohh, Rinkah! You mentioned this
festival is tradition for your tribe,
didn't you?$k$pSince you're the master, would
you help educate us? We can use
all the help we can get!$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族リンカ,ch05_51_Rinka_F_FireFes22,Face|There's something you should
know about the Flame Tribe.$k$pWe make it a point to NOT get
involved in the affairs of others.$k$p$WmMPID_双界ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_FF_Pair,Face|Come now! I want to be able to
help others like my brother does,
but I don't have the strength yet!$k$p$WmMPID_炎部族リンカ,ch05_51_Rinka_F_FireFes22,Face|Well... If your wish truly is to grow
stronger, you must be completely
committed. Fully devoted.$k$pIf you believe you are ready, we
will need to find you a suitable
training partner. Follow me.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch08_05_Turner_FF_Pair,Face|Thank you! You're the best, Rinkah!$k$p$nMPID_双界ターナ|I cannot imagine having any better
teacher than you, Rinkah! We are
ready to begin when you are!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_炎部族リンカ,ch05_51_Rinka_F_FireFes22,Face|Hmm... How about those two? They
are somewhat bigger than you, but
it should be fine. Go on.$k$p$WmMPID_双界ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_FF_Pair,Face|Who? Th-them?!$k$pThey look a little intimidating.
I have a feeling this will hurt...$k$p$nMPID_神階ピアニー|Don't give up before we've even
started, Tana!$k$p$nMPID_双界ターナ|I suppose you are probably
right...AGAIN.$k$pIn that case, let's begin!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_炎部族リンカ,ch05_51_Rinka_F_FireFes22,Face|Tana! Avoid approaching them from
the front! Do not allow them to gain
an advantage from their size! Think!$k$p$WmMPID_双界ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_FF_Pair,Face|Yaaahhh! This is impossible!$k$p$Sbs150|
